author: Paul Rankin
method: Heat one tablespoon of the olive oil in a frying pan and fry the bacon until golden-brown and crisp, about 4-5 minutes. Remove from the pan and tear each rasher into three pieces. Place the bacon into a bowl with the remaining ingredients and stir well. Serve.
ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil,  2 rashers smoked back bacon,  1 vine tomato, seeds removed, sliced,  55g/2oz wild rocket,  1 tbsp chopped fresh chives,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
